p: The materials used to carry out the three-dimensional models and the corresponding measurements of the longitudinal sections of the topographic profiles adopted by the sand in each case of the ABs tested were (i) the photogrammetric correlation software Photoscan from Agisoft, (ii) TRIMBLE three-dimensional software for the treatment and management of point clouds, and (iii) a Canon EOS1DX MKIII camera, with a resolution of 21.1 Mpx, 35 mm format, Complementary Metal Oxide Semiconductor (CMOS) sensor, and a 50 mm lens for image acquisition.
